Package org.deri.tarql

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharsetDetectingReader
    A Reader that wraps an InputStream and automatically takes care of guessing the input stream's encoding, using the jchardet library.
    CSVOptions
    Configuration options for describing a CSV file.
    CSVParser
    Parses a CSV file presented as a Reader, and delivers results as an iterator of Bindings.
    CSVTable
    Implementation of ARQ's Table interface over a CSV file.
    InputStreamSource
    A source of InputStreams.
    StreamingRDFWriter
    Writes an iterator over triples to N-Triples or Turtle in a streaming fashion, that is, without needing to hold the entire thing in memory.
    StreamRDFDedup
    Wraps another StreamRDF and attempts to remove duplicate triples and quads.
    tarql
    The tarql CLI command.
    TarqlParser
    Parses a TarqlQuery provided as a string or reader.
    TarqlQuery
    A Tarql mapping.
    TarqlQueryExecution
    The execution of a TarqlQuery over a particular CSV file.
    TarqlQueryExecutionFactory
    Static convenience methods for setting up TARQL query executions.
    URLOptionsParser
    Extracts a CSVOptions object from the fragment part of a CSV file URL, e.g., http://example.com/file.csv#encoding=utf-8;header=absent The remainder of the URL, with anything interpretable removed, can also be obtained from the returned parse result.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TarqlException
